info.title: AccuWeather
info.description: AccuWeather provides commercial weather forecasting services worldwide.

get.description: Returns basic information about locations matching an autocomplete of the search text.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Text to use for Autocomplete search.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

get.description: Returns daily forecast data for a specific location.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Time interval (duration)

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to display metric values.

get.description: Returns forecast data for the next hour(s) for a specific location.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Time interval (duration)

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

parameters.name: metric
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to display metric values.

get.description: Returns current conditions data for a specific location. Current conditions searches require a location key. Please use the Locations API to obtain the location key for your desired location. By default, a truncated version of the current conditions data is returned. The full object can be obtained by passing "details=true" into the url string.

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: Unique ID used to search for a specific location.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource. (Default en-us)

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

IsDaylightSaving.description: Whether he time zone is Daylight Saving.
IsDaylightSaving.title: Time Zone Is Daylight Saving

NextOffsetChange.description: The time zone next offset change.
NextOffsetChange.title: Time Zone Next Offset Change

UnitType.description: The elevation in metric unit type.
UnitType.title: Elevation Metric Unit Type

UnitType.description: The elevation in imperial unit type.
UnitType.title: Elevation Imperial Unit Type

get.description: Returns information about a specific location, by location key. You must know the location key to perform this query.

parameters.name: locationKey
parameters.description: The key for the location being searched.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: String indicating the language in which to return the resource.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Boolean value specifies whether or not to include full details in the response.

IsDaylightSaving.description: Whether the time zone is Daylight Saving.
IsDaylightSaving.title: Time Zone Is Daylight Saving

NextOffsetChange.description: The time zone next offset change.
NextOffsetChange.title: Time Zone Next Offset Change

UnitType.description: The elevation in metric unit type.
UnitType.title: Elevation Metric Unit Type

UnitType.description: The elevation in imperial unit type.
UnitType.title: Elevation Imperial Unit Type

LocalizedName.description: The supplemental administrative area localized name.
LocalizedName.title: Supplemental Administrative Area Localized Name

EnglishName.description: The supplemental administrative area English name.
EnglishName.title: Supplemental Administrative Area English Name

Climo.description: The details source of the climatology data.
Climo.title: Details Climo

NXMetro.description: The details city level radar code.
NXMetro.title: Details NX Metro

NXState.description: The details state level radar code.
NXState.title: Details NX State

PrimaryWarningCountyCode.description: The details primary warning county code.
PrimaryWarningCountyCode.title: Details Primary Warning County Code

PrimaryWarningZoneCode.description: The details primary warning zone code.
PrimaryWarningZoneCode.title: Details Primary Warning Zone Code

MarineStationGMTOffset.description: The details marine station GMT offset.
MarineStationGMTOffset.title: Details Marine Station GMT Offset

ID.description: The details Designated Marketing Area ID.
ID.title: Details DMA ID

EnglishName.description: The details Designated Marketing Area English name.
EnglishName.title: Details DMA English Name

get.description: Returns information about a specific location, by IP Address.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A valid IP address to search for.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language in which to return the resource.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Whether or not to include full details in the response.

x-ms-openai-manifest.modelDescription: This is a Copilot plugin for the AccuWeather weather service. It can return forecasts, current conditions, and historical conditions.
